scripts.build:solidato: CURRENT_DAO=solidato pnpm codegen && pnpm generate:contracts-addresses:solidato && graph build --ipfs $IPFS
scripts.deploy-production:solidato: NETWORK=evmos pnpm build:solidato && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS solidatoDAO/$FORK --network-file networks/solidato.json --network optimism
scripts.deploy-staging:solidato: NETWORK=tevmos pnpm build:solidato && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS solidatoDAO/$FORK/staging --network-file networks/solidato.json --network optimism-test
